entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
